text: The following lists events that happened in 1960 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *President - Ásgeir Ásgeirsson *Prime Minister - Ólafur Thors ==Events== ==Births== Guðmundur Guðmundsson *1 June - Einar Vilhjálmsson, javelin thrower *18 July - Guðmundur Steinsson, footballer *30 July - Árni Þór Sigurðsson, ambassador *4 September - Elín Hirst, politician. *16 October - Bjarni Sigurðsson, footballer *13 November - Jón Loftur Árnason, chess grandmaster *8 December - Broddi Kristjansson, badminton player *8 December - Sólveig Anspach, film director and screenwriter (d. 2015) *23 December - Guðmundur Guðmundsson, handball player ==References== Category:1960s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1960 in Iceland
